label: TrelloApi
description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

tools.name: AddAttachmentToTrelloCard
tools.description:
Attach a file or link to a Trello card.

Use this tool to add an attachment, such as a file or link, to a specific Trello card by providing the card's ID.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello card to which the attachment will be added.

parameters.name: attachment_mime_type
parameters.description: The MIME type of the attachment file. Should be a valid MIME type string (max 256 characters).

parameters.name: attachment_name
parameters.description: The name of the attachment. Maximum length is 256 characters.

parameters.name: attachment_url
parameters.description: A URL to attach to the Trello card. Must start with 'http://' or 'https://'.

parameters.name: file_attachment
parameters.description: The file data to upload and attach to the Trello card as multipart/form-data.

parameters.name: use_as_card_cover
parameters.description: Set to true to use the new attachment as the card cover.

tools.name: AddCommentToTrelloCard
tools.description:
Add a comment to a specific Trello card.

Use this tool to post a new comment on a Trello card given its ID. It is useful for users needing to add updates or notes directly on a Trello card.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello card where the comment will be added.

parameters.name: comment_text
parameters.description: The content of the comment to be added to the Trello card.

comment_text.value: This is a comment added to the Trello card.

tools.name: AddDropdownOptionCustomField
tools.description:
Add an option to a dropdown Custom Field in Trello.

Use this tool to add a new option to a dropdown Custom Field on a Trello board. This should be called when needing to expand the choices available in a specific dropdown Custom Field.

parameters.name: custom_field_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the custom field to which a dropdown option will be added.

tools.name: AddLabelToTrelloCard
tools.description:
Add a label to a Trello card.

Use this tool to assign a label to a specific card in Trello by specifying the card ID.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the specific Trello card.

parameters.name: label_id
parameters.description: The ID of the label to add to the Trello card.

tools.name: AddMemberToBoard
tools.description:
Add a member to a Trello board.

Use this tool to add a member to a specific Trello board by providing the board ID and the member ID.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The ID of the board to update. Required to specify which Trello board the member will be added to.

parameters.name: member_id_to_add
parameters.description: The ID of the member to add to the Trello board.

parameters.name: member_role_type
parameters.description: Specifies the role of the member on the board. Choose from 'admin', 'normal', or 'observer'.

parameters.name: allow_billable_guest
parameters.description: Set to true to allow organization admins to add multi-board guests to the board.

tools.name: AddMemberToTrelloCard
tools.description:
Add a member to a specified Trello card.

Use this tool to assign a specific member to a Trello card by providing the card ID and member information.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Trello card to which a member will be added. It is required to specify which card the member should be added to.

parameters.name: member_id_to_add
parameters.description: The ID of the member to add to the specified Trello card.

tools.name: AddOrUpdateWorkspaceMember
tools.description:
Add or update a member in a Trello Workspace.

This tool is used to add a new member to a Trello Workspace or update the type of an existing member. It should be called when you need to manage workspace memberships and roles.

parameters.name: member_id_or_username
parameters.description: The ID or username of the member to add or update in the Trello Workspace.

parameters.name: member_role_type
parameters.description: Specify the role of the member in the workspace. Acceptable values are 'admin' or 'normal'.

parameters.name: organization_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Trello organization to which the member will be added or updated.

tools.name: AddReactionToTrelloAction
tools.description:
Add a reaction to a Trello action.

Use this tool to add a new reaction to a specific action within Trello. It should be called when you want to express feedback or sentiment on an action item on Trello.

parameters.name: action_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello action to which you want to add a reaction.

parameters.name: emoji_short_name
parameters.description: The short name of the emoji to add as a reaction, like 'thumbsup' or 'smile'.

parameters.name: emoji_skin_variation
parameters.description: Specifies the `skinVariation` for the emoji being added as a reaction, like default or medium-light.

parameters.name: emoji_unified_value
parameters.description: The `unified` value of the emoji to add to the Trello action. This is a code representing the emoji and is used to specify the exact emoji to add.

parameters.name: native_emoji_unicode
parameters.description: The native unicode emoji to add as a reaction. It should be a valid emoji character.

tools.name: AddStickerToTrelloCard
tools.description:
Add a sticker to a specific Trello card.

Use this tool to attach a sticker to a Trello card by specifying the card's ID. Ideal for organizing and visually enhancing your Trello boards.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello card to which the sticker will be added.

parameters.name: sticker_identifier
parameters.description: Specify the sticker ID for custom stickers or use default string identifiers like 'taco-cool' for default stickers.

parameters.name: sticker_left_position
parameters.description: The left position of the sticker. Acceptable values range from -60 to 100.

parameters.name: sticker_top_position
parameters.description: Specify the vertical position of the sticker on the card, ranging from -60 to 100.

parameters.name: sticker_z_index
parameters.description: Specify the z-index of the sticker to determine overlay order. Use integers to set layer depth.

parameters.name: sticker_rotation
parameters.description: The rotation angle of the sticker in degrees, allowing for visual adjustment.

tools.name: AddTrelloWebhook
tools.description:
Create a new webhook on Trello.

Use this tool to create a new webhook on Trello, enabling you to receive updates about changes to boards, cards, lists, or other Trello elements.

parameters.name: callback_url
parameters.description: A valid URL that supports `HEAD` and `POST` requests for webhook notifications.

parameters.name: model_id_to_monitor
parameters.description: ID of the Trello model (board, card, etc.) to monitor for changes.

parameters.name: is_webhook_active
parameters.description: A boolean to specify whether the webhook is active and sending POST requests.

parameters.name: webhook_description
parameters.description: A description of the webhook, up to 16384 characters long.

webhook_description.value: Webhook for monitoring changes to the project board.

tools.name: ArchiveAllCardsInList
tools.description:
Archives all cards in a specified Trello list.

Use this tool to archive all cards within a specific Trello list. This action is useful for organizing and managing tasks by clearing out completed or irrelevant cards.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello list to archive all cards from.

tools.name: ArchiveOrUnarchiveTrelloList
tools.description:
Archive or unarchive a Trello list.

Use this tool to archive or unarchive a specific list in Trello by providing the list ID. It helps manage list visibility and workflow on Trello boards.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello list to archive or unarchive.

parameters.name: archive_list
parameters.description: Set to true to archive the list or false to unarchive.

tools.name: CheckBoardBillableGuests
tools.description:
Check if a board has new billable guests.

This tool is used to determine if a specific Trello board has new billable guests. Use it when you need to audit or manage guest access on a board.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello board to check for new billable guests.

parameters.name: organization_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Trello organization to check for new billable guests on the board.

tools.name: CheckOrganizationTransferability
tools.description:
Check if an organization can be transferred to an enterprise.

This tool checks whether a specified organization can be transferred to an enterprise, providing the transferability status.

parameters.name: enterprise_id
parameters.description: ID of the Enterprise to check for organization transferability.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The ID of the organization to check for transferability.

tools.name: CreateBoardTag
tools.description:
Create a new tag for a Trello board.

Call this tool to create a new tag for an existing Trello board. It should be used when you want to organize or categorize elements within a board with new tags.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello board where the tag will be created.

parameters.name: organization_tag_id
parameters.description: The ID of the tag from the organization to associate with the board.

tools.name: CreateCheckitemInChecklist
tools.description:
Create a new checkitem in a Trello checklist.

Use this tool to add a new checkitem to an existing checklist in Trello. This is useful for managing tasks and ensuring that all necessary steps are documented within a checklist.

parameters.name: checkitem_name
parameters.description: The name of the new check item on the checklist. Must be between 1 and 16384 characters long.

parameters.name: checklist_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the checklist where the checkitem will be created.

parameters.name: checkitem_due_date
parameters.description: Specify the due date for the checkitem in ISO 8601 format (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: checkitem_position
parameters.description: Position of the check item in checklist: `top`, `bottom`, or a positive number.

parameters.name: due_reminder_minutes
parameters.description: Minutes before the due date to trigger a reminder for the checkitem.

parameters.name: is_checkitem_checked
parameters.description: Set to true if the check item should be checked upon creation. Otherwise, it will be unchecked.

parameters.name: member_id
parameters.description: ID of the member to associate with the checkitem.

tools.name: CreateChecklistOnCard
tools.description:
Create a new checklist on a Trello card.

Use this tool to add a checklist to a specific Trello card by providing the card ID. It allows for organizing tasks within a card using checklists.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello card to which the checklist will be added.

parameters.name: checklist_name
parameters.description: The name of the checklist to be created on a Trello card.

parameters.name: checklist_position
parameters.description: Specify the position of the checklist on the card. Accepts `top`, `bottom`, or a positive number indicating the exact position.

parameters.name: source_checklist_id
parameters.description: The ID of a source checklist to copy into the new checklist. This is used to duplicate the tasks from another checklist.

tools.name: CreateCustomEmojiTrello
tools.description:
Create a new custom emoji in Trello.

Use this tool to create a custom emoji for a specific Trello member. Call this when you need to add a unique emoji to a member's collection.

parameters.name: emoji_image_file
parameters.description: Path or URL to the image file for the emoji. The image must be in a supported format.

parameters.name: emoji_name
parameters.description: Provide a name for the emoji, between 2 and 64 characters.

parameters.name: member_identifier
parameters.description: The ID or username of the Trello member to whom the emoji will be added.

tools.name: CreateEnterpriseAuthToken
tools.description:
Create an auth token for a Trello enterprise.

This tool generates an authentication token for a specified enterprise in Trello. Use it when managing enterprise-level access or automating processes that require specific enterprise authentication.

parameters.name: enterprise_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the enterprise for which the auth token will be generated.

parameters.name: token_expiration
parameters.description: Specify the token's duration: `1hour`, `1day`, `30days`, or `never`. This determines how long the token will be valid.

tools.name: CreateLabelOnBoard
tools.description:
Create a new label on a Trello board.

Use this tool to add a new label to a specific Trello board. This can help organize tasks by categorizing them with labels.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello board where the new label will be created.

parameters.name: label_color
parameters.description: Sets the color of the new label. Accepted values include specific colors or `null` for no color.

parameters.name: label_name
parameters.description: The name of the label to be created. It must be between 1 and 16,384 characters long.

tools.name: CreateMemberAvatar
tools.description:
Create a new avatar for a Trello member.

This tool creates a new avatar for a specific Trello member using their ID. It should be called when you need to update or set a member's avatar in Trello.

parameters.name: avatar_image_file
parameters.description: A string representing the image file data for the member's new avatar. It should be a file path or base64-encoded image.

parameters.name: member_id_or_username
parameters.description: The ID or username of the Trello member for whom you want to create an avatar. This identifies the member uniquely.

tools.name: CreateNewLabelOnBoard
tools.description:
Create a new label on a Trello board.

Use this tool to add a new label to a specified Trello board. This is useful for organizing and categorizing tasks within a board.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello board on which to create the new label. This is required to specify the target board.

parameters.name: label_color
parameters.description: Specify the color for the label. Choose from yellow, purple, blue, red, green, orange, black, sky, pink, or lime.

parameters.name: label_name
parameters.description: The name assigned to the new label being created on the Trello board.

tools.name: CreateOrganizationTag
tools.description:
Create a new tag within a specific Trello organization.

Use this tool to add a tag to a Trello organization by providing the organization ID. It facilitates organizing and categorizing items within the organization.

parameters.name: organization_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Trello organization where the tag will be created.

tools.name: CreateSavedSearch
tools.description:
Create a saved search for a Trello member.

Use this tool to create a saved search for a specific Trello member, helping them quickly access important search results in the future.

parameters.name: member_id_or_username
parameters.description: The ID or username of the Trello member for whom the saved search is created.

parameters.name: saved_search_name
parameters.description: The title for the saved search to be created for a Trello member.

parameters.name: saved_search_position
parameters.description: Specify the position of the saved search. Can be 'top', 'bottom', or a positive float for custom placement.

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: The search query to be saved for the Trello member.

tools.name: CreateTrelloBoard
tools.description:
Create a new board on Trello.

Use this tool to create a new board on Trello when you need to organize tasks or projects. It will return the details of the newly created board, allowing further actions or adjustments.

parameters.name: board_name
parameters.description: The new name for the Trello board. Must be between 1 to 16384 characters.

parameters.name: add_default_lists
parameters.description: Add the default lists (To Do, Doing, Done) to a new board. Ignored if `idBoardSource` is provided.

parameters.name: allow_self_join
parameters.description: Set to `true` to allow users to join the board themselves. Set to `false` if they need an invitation.

parameters.name: board_background_color
parameters.description: Specify the custom background ID or choose from predefined colors: blue, orange, green, red, purple, pink, lime, sky, grey.

parameters.name: board_description
parameters.description: A description for the new board, ranging from 0 to 16384 characters in length.

parameters.name: board_permission_level
parameters.description: Set the permission level of the board. Options are: `org`, `private`, `public`.

parameters.name: card_aging_type
parameters.description: Type of card aging on the board: `pirate` or `regular`. Determines visual changes over time when enabled.

parameters.name: comment_permission
parameters.description: Specify who can comment on cards: `disabled`, `members`, `observers`, `org`, `public`.

parameters.name: enable_card_covers
parameters.description: Boolean to determine whether card covers are enabled on the board.

parameters.name: enabled_power_ups
parameters.description: Specify the Power-Ups to enable on the board. Options: all, calendar, cardAging, recap, voting.

parameters.name: include_original_cards
parameters.description: Specify 'cards' to keep cards from the original board when copying; otherwise, omit for none.

parameters.name: invitation_permissions
parameters.description: Specifies who can invite users to join the board. Choose either `admins` or `members`.

parameters.name: source_board_id
parameters.description: The ID of the board to copy for creating a new board.

parameters.name: use_default_labels
parameters.description: Set to true to use the default set of labels on the new board; false to exclude them.

parameters.name: voting_permissions
parameters.description: Specifies who can vote on the board: `disabled`, `members`, `observers`, `org`, or `public`.

parameters.name: workspace_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Trello Workspace where the board will be created.

board_description.value: A board to manage project tasks and deadlines.

tools.name: CreateTrelloBoardList
tools.description:
Create a new list on a Trello board.

This tool creates a new list on a specified Trello board. Use it when you need to organize tasks by adding a new list to an existing board.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello board where the list will be created. Required for specifying which board to add the list to.

parameters.name: list_name
parameters.description: The name of the list to be created. It should be between 1 to 16384 characters in length.

parameters.name: list_position
parameters.description: Specifies where the list should be positioned. Use 'top', 'bottom', or a positive number for custom placement.

tools.name: CreateTrelloCardLabel
tools.description:
Add a new label to a specific Trello card.

This tool creates a new label on the specified Trello board and attaches it to the given card. Use this when you need to organize or categorize tasks by adding labels to cards in Trello.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello card to which the label will be added.

parameters.name: label_color
parameters.description: Specify a valid Trello label color or use 'null'. Check Trello's documentation for available colors.

parameters.name: label_name
parameters.description: The name for the label to add to the Trello card.

tools.name: CreateTrelloChecklist
tools.description:
Create a new checklist in Trello.

This tool creates a checklist in Trello. It should be called when a user wants to add a checklist to a Trello board.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Trello card where the checklist will be added.

parameters.name: checklist_name
parameters.description: The name of the checklist to be created. It should be a string with 1 to 16384 characters.

parameters.name: checklist_position
parameters.description: The position of the checklist on the card. Accepts 'top', 'bottom', or a positive number indicating specific placement.

parameters.name: source_checklist_id
parameters.description: The ID of the checklist to be copied into the new checklist.

tools.name: CreateTrelloCustomField
tools.description:
Create a new custom field on a Trello board.

This tool creates a new custom field on a specified Trello board. Call this tool when you need to add a custom field to organize or manage information on your Trello boards.

Note: Understanding the request schema is necessary to properly create
the stringified JSON input object for execution.

Modes:
- GET_REQUEST_SCHEMA: Returns the schema. Only call if you don't
  already have it. Do NOT call repeatedly if you already received
  the schema.
- EXECUTE: Performs the operation with the provided request body
  JSON.

If you need the schema, call with mode='get_request_schema' ONCE, then execute.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Operation mode: 'get_request_schema' returns the OpenAPI spec for the request body, 'execute' performs the actual operation

parameters.name: request_body
parameters.description: Stringified JSON representing the request body. Required when mode is 'execute', ignored when mode is 'get_request_schema'

tools.name: CreateTrelloList
tools.description:
Create a new list on a Trello board.

This tool is used to create a new list on a specified Trello board. It should be called when you want to organize tasks or items into a new category within a board.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The unique string ID of the Trello board where the list will be created.

parameters.name: list_name
parameters.description: The name of the new list to be created on the Trello board.

parameters.name: list_position
parameters.description: Position of the list on the board: `top`, `bottom`, or a positive floating number to specify exact placement.

parameters.name: source_list_id
parameters.description: ID of the list to copy into the new list. Leave blank to create a new list without copying.

tools.name: CreateTrelloPluginListing
tools.description:
Create a new listing for a Trello Power-Up.

This tool creates a new listing for a Trello Power-Up in a specified locale. Use this tool when you need to add a new entry for a Power-Up on Trello's platform.

parameters.name: power_up_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Power-Up for which you are creating a new listing.

parameters.name: listing_locale
parameters.description: The specific locale code (e.g., 'en-US') for which the listing should be displayed.

parameters.name: locale_description
parameters.description: The description for the Power-Up listing in the specified locale.

parameters.name: overview_for_locale
parameters.description: The overview text to display for the specified locale. Provide a concise summary relevant to the plugin.

parameters.name: plugin_locale_name
parameters.description: The name for the Power-Up listing in the specified locale.

locale_description.value: This Power-Up enhances your productivity by integrating with multiple tools.

overview_for_locale.value: Streamline your workflow with this Power-Up.

tools.name: CreateTrelloWebhook
tools.description:
Create a new webhook for a Trello token.

This tool allows you to create a new webhook for a specific Trello token. Use it to set up webhooks for tracking changes or events related to Trello boards or cards.

parameters.name: object_id_for_webhook
parameters.description: ID of the Trello object (board or card) to create a webhook on.

parameters.name: trello_token
parameters.description: The authentication token for Trello. It allows access to create the webhook. Required for authorization.

parameters.name: webhook_callback_url
parameters.description: The URL where the webhook will POST updates. Ensure it's a valid and accessible URL.

parameters.name: webhook_description
parameters.description: A string description displayed when retrieving information about the webhook. It helps identify the purpose or function of the webhook.

tools.name: CreateWorkspaceTrello
tools.description:
Create a new Trello Workspace.

Use this tool to create a new Workspace in Trello. This can be utilized when users need to organize projects or teams within Trello by creating a new Workspace.

parameters.name: display_name
parameters.description: The name to display for the Trello Workspace. This is how the Workspace will be labeled in Trello.

parameters.name: website_url
parameters.description: A URL for the workspace starting with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: workspace_description
parameters.description: A detailed description for the Trello Workspace.

parameters.name: workspace_name
parameters.description: A lowercase alphanumeric string, min 3 characters, underscores allowed. Invalid characters are removed. Unique name is substituted if conflict occurs.

workspace_description.value: A workspace dedicated to organizing and managing our project teams efficiently.

tools.name: DeactivateEnterpriseMember
tools.description:
Deactivate a member in a Trello enterprise.

Deactivate a member of a Trello enterprise unless the enterprise uses AdminHub for user management.

parameters.name: deactivate_member
parameters.description: Set to True to deactivate the member, False to keep active.

parameters.name: enterprise_id
parameters.description: The ID of the enterprise from which the member should be deactivated.

parameters.name: member_id_to_deactivate
parameters.description: The ID of the member to deactivate in a Trello enterprise.

parameters.name: board_fields_to_include
parameters.description: Specify which board fields should be included. Use values like 'id', 'name', 'desc', etc.

parameters.name: nested_member_fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of valid values for the nested member field resource.

parameters.name: organization_fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields related to the organization, such as 'id' or 'name'.

tools.name: DeleteBoard
tools.description:
Delete a specific board from Trello.

Use this tool to delete a given board from Trello by providing its ID. This action cannot be undone, so ensure it's the right board before calling the tool.

parameters.name: board_id_to_delete
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello board to delete. Ensure it is the correct board as this action is irreversible.

tools.name: DeleteBoardBackground
tools.description:
Delete a board background from a member's Trello board.

This tool deletes a specified background from a member's Trello board, which can be useful for managing board appearances.

parameters.name: board_background_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the board background to be deleted.

parameters.name: member_id_or_username
parameters.description: The ID or username of the Trello member whose board background you want to delete.

tools.name: DeleteCardAttachment
tools.description:
Delete an attachment from a Trello card.

Use this tool to remove an attachment from a specified Trello card by providing the card ID and attachment ID.

parameters.name: attachment_id_to_delete
parameters.description: The ID of the attachment you want to delete from the card.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Trello card from which the attachment will be deleted.

tools.name: DeleteChecklistItemOnCard
tools.description:
Delete a checklist item from a Trello card.

Use this tool to delete a specific checklist item from a Trello card when you have the card ID and the checklist item ID.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello card from which you want to delete a checklist item.

parameters.name: checklist_item_id
parameters.description: The ID of the checklist item to delete from the card.

tools.name: DeleteCommentOnCard
tools.description:
Deletes a comment from a Trello card action.

This tool deletes a specific comment from a Trello card's action. It should be called when a user wants to remove a comment from a card.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Trello card from which the comment will be deleted.

parameters.name: comment_action_id
parameters.description: The ID of the comment action to be deleted from the card.

tools.name: DeleteCustomFieldOption
tools.description:
Delete an option from a Trello Custom Field dropdown.

Use this tool to remove a specific option from the dropdown list of a Custom Field in Trello. This is helpful when an option is no longer needed or should be removed from the available choices.

parameters.name: custom_field_item_id
parameters.description: ID of the customfielditem to identify which dropdown option to delete.

parameters.name: custom_field_option_id
parameters.description: ID of the custom field option to delete from the dropdown list.

tools.name: DeleteCustomSticker
tools.description: Deletes a custom sticker from a Trello member's account.

parameters.name: member_id_or_username
parameters.description: The ID or username of the Trello member whose sticker is to be deleted.

parameters.name: sticker_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the uploaded sticker to be deleted.

tools.name: DeleteLabelById
tools.description:
Delete a label in Trello by its ID.

Call this tool to delete a specific label from Trello by providing its unique ID.

parameters.name: label_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the label to be deleted from Trello.

tools.name: DeleteMemberFromWorkspace
tools.description:
Remove a member from a Workspace and all Workspace boards.

Use this tool to remove a specified member from a Trello Workspace and all associated boards. Useful for managing Workspace membership and access control.

parameters.name: member_id_to_remove
parameters.description: The ID of the member to be removed from the Workspace.

parameters.name: organization_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Trello organization (Workspace) from which the member is to be removed.

tools.name: DeleteOrganizationTag
tools.description:
Delete a specified tag from an organization.

Use this tool to remove a tag from a specified organization in Trello by providing the organization ID and tag ID.

parameters.name: organization_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the organization from which to delete the tag.

parameters.name: tag_id_to_delete
parameters.description: The ID of the tag to be removed from the organization.

tools.name: DeleteSavedSearchOnTrello
tools.description:
Remove a saved search from a Trello member account.

This tool is used to delete a saved search from a member's account on Trello. It should be called when a user wants to permanently remove a saved search from their list.

parameters.name: member_id_or_username
parameters.description: The ID or username identifying the member whose saved search is to be deleted.

parameters.name: saved_search_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the saved search to delete from a Trello member's account.

tools.name: DeleteTrelloAction
tools.description:
Delete a specific comment action from Trello.

parameters.description: Set to 'True' if authentication is required for the API call, otherwise 'False'.

parameters.name: has_confirmation_been_accepted
parameters.description: Indicates whether the user has accepted the required confirmations before being redirected.

parameters.name: redirect_url

tools.name: GetEnterpriseUsers
tools.description:
Fetch users from a Trello enterprise.

Retrieve the users of a specified Trello enterprise, including licensed members and board guests. The response is paginated, returning 100 users per call.

parameters.name: enterprise_id
parameters.description: ID of the Trello enterprise to retrieve users from.

parameters.name: active_date_filter
parameters.description: Returns only Trello users active since this date (inclusive). Provide the date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: active_since_date
parameters.description: Filter users active since this date (inclusive). Use YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: fetch_deactivated_members
parameters.description: When true, returns members who have been deactivated; when false, returns members who have not. Both active and deactivated members are returned if unspecified.

parameters.name: licensed_members_only
parameters.description: Set to true to retrieve only members with a license for the Trello Enterprise; false for only unlicensed members. Leave unspecified to include both licensed and unlicensed members.

parameters.name: only_admin_members
parameters.description: Set to True to return only administrators of the Trello Enterprise. If False, return non-admins. Unspecified returns both.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Cursor value to fetch the next set of user results. Use the cursor received from a previous response to continue fetching more users.

parameters.name: return_board_guests
parameters.description: Set to true to return members who are guests on boards; false to return only non-guests. If not set, both are included.

parameters.name: return_managed_members_only
parameters.description: Specify true to return only managed members, false for only unmanaged, or omit for both.

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: String to search for members by email or full name starting with this value.

tools.name: GetTrelloListActions
tools.description:
Retrieve actions performed on a specific Trello list.

Use this tool to get all actions that have been performed on a specific Trello list by providing the list ID.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Trello list to retrieve actions for.

parameters.name: action_types
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of action types to filter actions on the Trello list.

tools.name: GetTrelloListInfo
tools.description:
Retrieve details for a specific Trello list using its ID.

Use this tool to obtain detailed information about a Trello list by providing its unique identifier. Call this when specific list details are required to view or manage.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello list to retrieve information for.

parameters.name: list_fields
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or provide a comma-separated list of list field names to retrieve specific details.

tools.name: GetTrelloMemberInfo
tools.description:
Fetch information about a Trello member profile.

Use this tool to get detailed information about a specific Trello member by their ID. This is useful for accessing profile details of users within Trello.

parameters.name: member_id_or_username
parameters.description: The ID or username of the Trello member to retrieve information for.

parameters.name: board_backgrounds_option
parameters.description: Specify type of board backgrounds: `all`, `custom`, `default`, `none`, or `premium`.

parameters.name: include_actions
parameters.description: Include actions related to the member. Refer to the Actions Nested Resource for details.

parameters.name: include_boards_details
parameters.description: Specify if you want to include detailed information about the member's boards. Refer to the Boards Nested Resource for options.

parameters.name: include_boards_invited
parameters.description: Specify `all` or a comma-separated list of board states like closed, members, open, etc., to filter invited boards.

parameters.name: include_card_details
parameters.description: Include detailed information about cards associated with the member. Refer to the Cards Nested Resource for options.

parameters.name: include_custom_board_backgrounds
parameters.description: Specify whether to include custom board backgrounds. Use `all` for all backgrounds or `none` to exclude them.

parameters.name: include_custom_emoji
parameters.description: Specify whether to include all custom emojis ('all') or none ('none') in the response.

parameters.name: include_custom_stickers
parameters.description: Specify if custom stickers should be included. Use `all` to include or `none` to exclude.

parameters.name: include_invited_organizations
parameters.description: Specify the scope of invited organizations to include: all, members, none, or public.

parameters.name: include_paid_account_information
parameters.description: Include paid account information in the returned member object when true.

parameters.name: include_paid_account_information_in_workspace
parameters.description: Include paid account information in the returned workspace object if true.

parameters.name: include_saved_searches
parameters.description: Set to true to include saved searches information in the response, false to exclude.

parameters.name: include_tokens
parameters.description: Include tokens associated with the member. Options: `all` to include, `none` to exclude.

parameters.name: invited_boards_fields
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of board fields for invited boards. Options include: id, name, desc, and more.

parameters.name: member_fields_selection
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of member fields to retrieve information about. Use 'all' to retrieve all available member fields.

parameters.name: notification_details
parameters.description: Fetch notification information related to the member. Refer to the Notifications Nested Resource for options.

parameters.name: organization_fields_selection
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or provide a comma-separated list of organization fields like 'id', 'name'.

parameters.name: organization_fields_to_include
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of organization fields like 'id', 'name' to include in the response.

parameters.name: organization_visibility
parameters.description: Specify organization visibility: `all`, `members`, `none`, or `public`.

parameters.name: return_board_stars
parameters.description: Set to true to return boardStars in the response, otherwise false to exclude them.

tools.name: GetTrelloMemberNotificationSettings
tools.description:
Retrieve blocked notification keys for a Trello member's channel.

Fetches the blocked notification keys of a member on a specific Trello channel. Useful for managing notification preferences or debugging notification issues.

parameters.name: member_id_or_username
parameters.description: The ID or username of the Trello member to retrieve notification settings for.

parameters.name: notification_channel
parameters.description: Specify the channel to block notifications on for the Trello member. Accepted value: 'email'.

tools.name: GetTrelloNotification
tools.description:
Retrieve detailed Trello notification information by ID.

Use this tool to obtain information about a specific Trello notification. Call this tool when you need to retrieve detailed data for a notification using its unique identifier.

parameters.name: notification_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Trello notification you want to retrieve.

parameters.name: board_fields_list
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of board fields to include.

parameters.name: card_fields_to_include
parameters.description: Specify `all` or a comma-separated list of card fields to include, such as `id`, `name`, or `due`.

parameters.name: include_board_object
parameters.description: Include the board object in the response if true.

parameters.name: include_card
parameters.description: Specify True to include the card object.

parameters.name: include_creator_member
parameters.description: Set to true to include the member object of the creator in the response.

parameters.name: include_display_object
parameters.description: Set to true to include the display object with the results.

parameters.name: include_entities_object
parameters.description: Include the entities object in the notification results. Set to true to include, false to exclude.

parameters.name: include_list_object
parameters.description: Include the list object in the notification data if set to true.

parameters.name: include_member_fields
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of member fields to include in the response.

parameters.name: include_member_object
parameters.description: Include the member object in the notification details if set to true.

parameters.name: include_notification_fields
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of notification fields to include, such as 'id', 'unread', or 'type'.

parameters.name: include_organization
parameters.description: Set to true to include the organization object in the response.

parameters.name: member_creator_fields
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of member fields to include the member object of the creator.

parameters.name: organization_fields
parameters.description: Specify `all` or a comma-separated list of organization fields (e.g., `id`, `name`) to include in the response.

tools.name: GetTrelloNotificationList
tools.description:
Retrieve the list a Trello notification is associated with.

Use this tool to find out which list a specific Trello notification belongs to. It is useful when you need to track or organize tasks based on notification details.

parameters.name: notification_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello notification to retrieve the associated list for.

parameters.name: notification_fields
parameters.description: Specify `all` or a comma-separated list of fields for the list associated with the notification.

tools.name: GetTrelloNotificationProperty
tools.description:
Retrieve a specific property of a Trello notification.

This tool is called to get a particular property of a Trello notification, using its ID and the field name as parameters.

parameters.name: notification_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello notification to query.

parameters.name: notification_property_field
parameters.description: Specify the property field of the Trello notification to retrieve. Options include: id, unread, type, date, dateRead, data, card, board, idMemberCreator, idAction, reactions.

tools.name: GetTrelloPluginInfo
tools.description:
Retrieve information about a specific Trello plugin.

Use this tool to get detailed information about a Trello plugin by its ID. It can be useful when you need to understand plugin capabilities or configurations.

parameters.name: organization_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the organization for which the plugin information is requested.

tools.name: GetTrelloTokenOwner
tools.description:
Retrieve information about a Trello token's owner.

Use this tool to get details about the owner of a specified Trello token. Useful when you need to verify token ownership or access token-related user information.

parameters.name: trello_token
parameters.description: The unique Trello token to identify and retrieve the owner information. Must be a valid string.

parameters.name: retrieve_fields
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of Trello member fields to retrieve, such as 'id'.

tools.name: GetTrelloWebhookById
tools.description:
Retrieve details of a Trello webhook by its ID.

Use this tool to get detailed information about a specific Trello webhook by providing its ID. Ensure the correct token is used to avoid errors.

parameters.name: webhook_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Trello webhook to retrieve.

tools.name: GetWebhookField
tools.description:
Retrieve a specific field from a Trello webhook.

Use this tool to get a specific field from a Trello webhook by providing the webhook ID and the field name you want to access.

parameters.name: webhook_field_to_retrieve
parameters.description: Specify which field to retrieve from the webhook. Options are: `active`, `callbackURL`, `description`, `idModel`.

parameters.name: webhook_id
parameters.description: ID of the Trello webhook to retrieve information from.

tools.name: GetWorkspacePluginData
tools.description:
Retrieve organization scoped plugin data for a Trello workspace.

Use this tool to obtain plugin data specific to a Trello workspace by its organization ID. This is useful for accessing settings or configurations from plugins associated with the workspace.

parameters.name: organization_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the organization in Trello to retrieve plugin data for a workspace.

tools.name: InviteMemberToTrelloBoard
tools.description:
Invite a member to a Trello board via email.

Use this tool to invite a new member to a Trello board using their email address. It is useful for adding collaborators to a project board.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Trello board to which the member will be invited.

parameters.name: member_email_address
parameters.description: The email address of the user to be added as a member to the Trello board.

parameters.name: member_access_type
parameters.description: Specifies the role of the new board member. Valid values are: admin, normal, or observer.

parameters.name: user_full_name
parameters.description: The full name of the user being invited. Must be at least 1 character and not begin or end with a space.

tools.name: ListAvailableEmoji
tools.description:
Retrieve a list of available emojis on Trello.

This tool is used to fetch and list all the available emojis from Trello, useful for incorporating emojis into Trello cards or boards.

parameters.name: include_spritesheet_urls
parameters.description: Set to true to include spritesheet URLs in the response.

parameters.name: locale_for_emoji
parameters.description: Specify the locale for returning emoji descriptions and names. Defaults to the logged-in member's locale.

tools.name: ListBoardPowerUps
tools.description:
Retrieve the Power-Ups enabled on a Trello board.

Use this tool to get a list of Power-Ups (plugins) that are currently enabled on a specified Trello board. This can be useful for managing and understanding the capabilities of the board.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello board for which to list Power-Ups.

parameters.name: power_up_filter
parameters.description: Specify the filter for Power-Ups: choose 'enabled' to list only those currently active on the board, or 'available' to list those that can be activated.

tools.name: ListCardAttachments
tools.description:
Retrieve all attachments from a specified Trello card.

Use this tool to get a list of attachments associated with a specific Trello card. It is useful when you need to access or display all files attached to a card in Trello.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello card to retrieve attachments from.

parameters.name: attachment_fields
parameters.description: Specify 'all' for all fields or a comma-separated list of attachment fields to retrieve.

parameters.name: restrict_to_cover_attachment
parameters.description: Set to 'cover' to retrieve only the cover attachment of the card.

tools.name: ListMemberActions
tools.description:
Retrieve a list of actions for a specified member.

Use this tool to get all actions associated with a particular Trello member by their ID.

parameters.name: member_identifier
parameters.description: The ID or username of the Trello member whose actions you want to retrieve.

parameters.name: action_types_filter
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of action types to filter the actions of a Trello member.

tools.name: ListMemberBoardStars
tools.description:
Retrieve a member's board stars on Trello.

Use this tool to fetch and list all the board stars associated with a Trello member, identified by their member ID.

parameters.name: member_id_or_username
parameters.description: The ID or username of the Trello member whose board stars are to be listed.

tools.name: ListMemberSavedSearches
tools.description:
Retrieve a Trello member's saved searches.

Use this tool to obtain a list of saved searches for a specific Trello member. Ideal for accessing or reviewing saved queries associated with a member account.

parameters.name: member_id_or_username
parameters.description: The ID or username of the Trello member whose saved searches you want to retrieve.

tools.name: ListOrganizationCollections
tools.description:
List collections or tags for a specified organization on Trello.

Use this tool to retrieve a list of collections or tags associated with a specific organization on Trello by providing the organization ID.

parameters.name: organization_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Trello organization to list collections for.

tools.name: ListReactionsForAction
tools.description:
Retrieve reactions for a specific Trello action.

This tool retrieves a list of reactions associated with a specific action on Trello. It should be called when you need to see how users have reacted to a particular action on a Trello board.

parameters.name: action_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the action for which you want to list reactions.

parameters.name: include_member_as_nested_resource
parameters.description: Specify true to include the member as a nested resource in the response. Useful for detailed member information.

parameters.name: load_emoji_as_nested_resource
parameters.description: Set to true to load the emoji as a nested resource.

tools.name: ListTrelloCardsInList
tools.description:
Fetches all cards from a specified Trello list.

Use this tool to obtain all cards from a specific Trello list by providing the list ID. It is useful for retrieving tasks or items organized under a particular list in a Trello board.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Trello list to fetch cards from.

tools.name: ListUserBoards
tools.description:
Retrieve boards a user is a member of on Trello.

Use this tool to get a list of all boards that a specific user is a member of on Trello. Useful for managing or viewing user-related board information.

parameters.name: member_identifier
parameters.description: The ID or username of the Trello member whose boards are to be retrieved.

parameters.name: board_fields
parameters.description: Specify `all` or a comma-separated list of board fields to include in the response. Available fields include 'id', 'name', 'desc', 'descData', 'closed', 'idMemberCreator', 'idOrganization', 'pinned', 'url', 'shortUrl', 'prefs', 'labelNames', 'starred', 'limits', 'memberships', 'enterpriseOwned'.

parameters.name: board_filter
parameters.description: Filter boards by specifying 'all' or a comma-separated list of statuses like 'closed', 'members', 'open', etc.

parameters.name: include_lists
parameters.description: Specify which lists to include with the boards. Options: `all`, `closed`, `none`, `open`.

parameters.name: include_organization
parameters.description: Set to true to include the Organization object with the Boards.

parameters.name: organization_fields_to_include
parameters.description: Specifies which organization fields to include, either `all` or a comma-separated list of specific fields like `id` and `name`.

tools.name: ListWorkspaceActions
tools.description:
Retrieve actions related to a specific Trello Workspace.

Use this tool to obtain a list of all actions that have taken place within a specific Trello Workspace. This can include changes, updates, and any other activities relevant to the workspace.

parameters.name: organization_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Trello Workspace to list actions for.

tools.name: ListWorkspaceBoards
tools.description:
Retrieve boards in a specified Trello Workspace.

Use this tool to get a list of all boards within a specific Trello Workspace by providing the workspace ID.

parameters.name: workspace_identifier
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Trello Workspace to retrieve boards from.

parameters.name: board_fields
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of board fields such as 'id', 'name', 'desc', etc. This determines which fields to include in the response.

parameters.name: board_filter
parameters.description: Specify `all` or a comma-separated list of `open`, `closed`, `members`, `organization`, `public` to filter board types.

tools.name: ListWorkspaceMembers
tools.description:
Retrieve members of a Trello Workspace by ID.

Use this tool to obtain a list of all members within a specific Trello Workspace by providing the workspace ID.

parameters.name: workspace_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Trello Workspace to retrieve members from.

tools.name: ListWorkspaceMemberships
tools.description:
Retrieve memberships of a Trello Workspace.

Use this tool to obtain a list of all memberships in a specified Trello Workspace. Useful for understanding who belongs to a Workspace and their roles.

parameters.name: organization_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Trello Workspace you want to retrieve memberships for.

parameters.name: include_member_objects
parameters.description: Whether to include Member objects with the Workspace memberships. `True` to include, `False` to exclude.

parameters.name: membership_filter
parameters.description: Filter memberships: use `all` or a comma-separated list of `active`, `admin`, `deactivated`, `me`, `normal`.

tools.name: MakeMemberAdminEnterprise
tools.description:
Promote a member to admin in a Trello enterprise.

Call this tool to make a specified member an admin of a Trello enterprise. Note that this endpoint is unavailable for enterprises using AdminHub for user management.

parameters.name: enterprise_id
parameters.description: The ID of the enterprise for which you want to promote a member to admin.

parameters.name: member_id_to_promote
parameters.description: ID of the member to be promoted to admin of the enterprise.

tools.name: MarkAllNotificationsRead
tools.description:
Marks all Trello notifications as read.

Use this tool to mark all notifications in Trello as read. This is useful for clearing unread notification indicators.

parameters.name: mark_as_read
parameters.description: Specify true to mark notifications as read or false to mark as unread. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: notification_ids
parameters.description: A list of notification IDs to mark as read or unread. Useful for grouping related notifications.

tools.name: MarkNotificationAsUnread
tools.description:
Mark a Trello notification as unread.

Use this tool to update the read status of a specific Trello notification to unread. Call this when you need to change a notification back to an unread state.

parameters.name: notification_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Trello notification you want to mark as unread.

parameters.name: notification_read_status
parameters.description: Set this to an empty string to mark the notification as unread. This is a required field to change the read status.

tools.name: MarkTrelloBoardAsViewed
tools.description:
Mark a Trello board as viewed to update status.

Use this tool to mark a specific Trello board as viewed. This can be useful to update the current status of interaction with the board.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello board to mark as viewed.

tools.name: MarkTrelloCardNotificationsRead
tools.description:
Mark Trello card notifications as read.

Use this tool to mark all notifications associated with a specific Trello card as read. Ideal for managing notification statuses efficiently.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello card whose notifications need to be marked as read.

tools.name: ModifyMemberNotificationsTrello
tools.description:
Update a member's blocked notification keys on Trello.

Use this tool to update the blocked notification keys for a specific member's notification channel in Trello. It should be called when changes to notification preferences are required for a member.

parameters.name: blocked_notification_keys
parameters.description: List the notification keys to block, either as a singular key or comma-separated list. Valid keys include: notification_comment_card, notification_added_a_due_date, notification_changed_due_date, and others.

parameters.name: member_id_or_username
parameters.description: The ID or username of the Trello member whose notification settings will be updated.

parameters.name: notification_channel
parameters.description: Specify the channel to block notifications on, such as 'email'.

tools.name: ModifyTrelloComment
tools.description:
Update the text of a Trello comment action.

Use this tool to modify the text of an existing comment in Trello by specifying the action ID.

parameters.name: action_id_to_update
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello comment action to update.

parameters.name: new_comment_text
parameters.description: Provide the new text for the Trello comment you wish to update.

new_comment_text.value: This comment has been updated with new information.

tools.name: ModifyTrelloWebhook
tools.description:
Updates a Trello webhook by its ID.

Use this tool to update a specific Trello webhook when you need to modify its configuration or target URL. Useful for maintaining synchronization with external services.

parameters.name: webhook_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello webhook to update. This identifies which webhook's settings you want to modify.

parameters.name: activate_webhook
parameters.description: Set to true to activate the webhook and enable sending POST requests, or false to deactivate.

parameters.name: callback_url
parameters.description: A valid URL that is reachable with a `HEAD` and `POST` request, used to receive webhook data.

parameters.name: model_id
parameters.description: ID of the model to be monitored for webhook updates.

parameters.name: webhook_description
parameters.description: A string describing the webhook, with a length from 0 to 16384 characters.

webhook_description.value: This webhook monitors updates to the project board.

tools.name: MoveTrelloListToBoard
tools.description:
Reorganize Trello by moving a list to another board.

Use this tool to transfer a Trello list from one board to another, helping in organizing and restructuring your projects more efficiently.

parameters.name: board_id_for_list_movement
parameters.description: The ID of the board to which the Trello list should be moved.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Trello list to be moved.

tools.name: RemoveCardSticker
tools.description:
Removes a specified sticker from a Trello card.

Use this tool to remove a specific sticker from a Trello card by providing the card and sticker identifiers.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello card from which the sticker will be removed.

parameters.name: sticker_id
parameters.description: The ID of the sticker to be removed from the specified Trello card.

tools.name: RemoveChecklistItem
tools.description:
Remove an item from a Trello checklist.

Use this tool to delete a specific item from a checklist in Trello, identified by its ID and the checklist ID.

parameters.name: check_item_id
parameters.description: The ID of the specific checklist item to be removed from Trello.

parameters.name: checklist_id
parameters.description: ID of the checklist from which the item will be removed.

tools.name: RemoveCustomBoardBackground
tools.description:
Delete a specific custom board background.

Use this tool to remove a specific custom board background for a member on Trello. Call this when you want to delete an unwanted or outdated board background to maintain organization.

parameters.name: custom_background_id
parameters.description: The ID of the custom board background to be deleted.

parameters.name: member_id_or_username
parameters.description: The ID or username of the member whose custom board background will be deleted.

tools.name: RemoveEmailDomainRestriction
tools.description:
Remove email domain restriction for Workspace invites.

This tool removes the restriction on which email domains can be invited to a Trello Workspace, allowing more flexible invitation policies.

parameters.name: organization_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Trello organization to remove the email domain restriction from.

tools.name: RemoveEnterpriseAdmin
tools.description:
Remove a member as admin from an enterprise.

Use this tool to remove a specific member from the admin role within an enterprise on Trello. Note that this endpoint is unavailable for enterprises using AdminHub for user management.

parameters.name: enterprise_id
parameters.description: The Trello Enterprise ID from which to remove the member as admin.

parameters.name: member_id_to_remove
parameters.description: ID of the member to be removed as an admin from the enterprise.

tools.name: RemoveLabelFromTrelloCard
tools.description:
Remove a specific label from a Trello card.

Use this tool to delete a label from a specific Trello card. It should be called when there's a need to manage labels by removing one from a card.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Trello card from which the label will be removed.

parameters.name: label_id_to_remove
parameters.description: The ID of the label you want to remove from the Trello card.

tools.name: RemoveMemberFromCard
tools.description:
Removes a member from a Trello card.

Use this tool to remove a specific member from a Trello card by providing the card ID and the member ID.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Trello card from which the member will be removed.

parameters.name: member_id_to_remove
parameters.description: The ID of the member to remove from the Trello card.

tools.name: RemoveMemberFromTrelloBoard
tools.description:
Remove a member from a specified Trello board.

Use this tool to delete a member from a Trello board by specifying the board and member IDs.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello board from which to remove a member.

parameters.name: member_id_to_remove
parameters.description: The ID of the member to remove from the Trello board.

tools.name: RemoveMemberFromWorkspace
tools.description:
Remove a member from a Trello Workspace.

Use this tool to remove a specific member from a Trello Workspace by providing the workspace and member IDs.

parameters.name: member_id
parameters.description: The ID of the member to remove from the Trello Workspace.

parameters.name: workspace_identifier
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Trello Workspace to identify the organization for removal of a member.

tools.name: RemoveMemberVote
tools.description:
Remove a member's vote from a Trello card.

Use this tool to remove a specific member's vote from a specified card in Trello. It is useful for managing voting permissions on cards.

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello card from which to remove the vote.

parameters.name: member_id_to_remove_vote
parameters.description: The ID of the member whose vote is to be removed from the Trello card.

tools.name: RemoveOrganizationFromEnterprise
tools.description:
Remove an organization from a Trello enterprise.

This tool removes a specified organization from a Trello enterprise. It should be called when you need to delete an association between an organization and an enterprise in Trello.

parameters.name: enterprise_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello enterprise from which the organization will be removed.

parameters.name: organization_id_to_remove
parameters.description: The ID of the organization to be removed from the Trello enterprise.

tools.name: RemoveTrelloWebhook
tools.description:
Delete a Trello webhook by ID.

Use this tool to delete a specific webhook in Trello by providing its ID.

parameters.name: webhook_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello webhook you want to delete.

tools.name: RemoveWorkspaceDomain
tools.description:
Remove the associated Google Apps domain from a Workspace.

This tool removes the associated Google Apps domain from a specified Trello Workspace. Use this when you need to dissociate a Google Apps domain from an organization.

parameters.name: organization_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Trello organization to dissociate the Google Apps domain from.

tools.name: RenameTrelloList
tools.description:
Renames a Trello list by its ID.

Use this tool to update the name of a specific Trello list. Call this when you need to change a list's title by specifying its ID.

parameters.name: list_field_to_update
parameters.description: Specifies the list field to update, such as 'name', 'pos', or 'subscribed'.

parameters.name: trello_list_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Trello list you want to rename.

parameters.name: new_list_name
parameters.description: The new name for the Trello list. Provide a descriptive and clear title to easily identify the list.

tools.name: RetrieveOrganizationExports
tools.description:
Retrieve exports for a Trello organization.

This tool should be called to get a list of exports that exist for a specific Trello organization. It returns the exports associated with the specified organization ID.

parameters.name: workspace_identifier
parameters.description: The identifier for the Trello Workspace, which can be either its ID or name.

tools.name: RetrieveTokenWebhooks
tools.description:
Retrieve all webhooks created with a specific token.

Use this tool to get a list of all webhooks associated with a given Trello token. This is useful for managing and reviewing webhook integrations.

parameters.name: trello_token
parameters.description: The Trello token used to retrieve associated webhooks. It identifies the user's session and permissions.

tools.name: RetrieveTrelloTokenInfo
tools.description:
Retrieve information about a Trello token.

parameters.name: request_body
